video_title: 인생 멜로 영화로 유명한 감동적인 판타지 로맨스 영화 [영화리뷰 결말포함]
transcript: [Music] it's perfect vintage portobello road it was only 10 pounds i'm so sorry sam really i i can't believe i did that good luck in your meeting not that you need it you're gonna be i'm had the folder there's a guy there who you know loves your delightfully impulsive nature [Applause] [Music] a surprise how to love him you never see her again could you live with that no i couldn't well you know what to do appreciate her and what you have just love her it's not for another two blogs you can't show up empty-handed [Music] if ian bought a ticket if he is coming home with me it's really sweet i hope so you deserve it [Music] thanks you do have a great trip hey oliver she was the best one if i was just a few years older this is for you oh well thank you it's not just the cute yeah we should go i am that's okay i'm so sorry i know i called yourself like a zillion times i spent the rest of the day walking around the city thinking whether we were gonna make it i met this cab driver and we talked we enjoy each other and i should appreciate i adore you i guess what i'm saying is i i want a soldier on okay i don't want a soldier on ian i know you have the best intentions very high second priority for you i don't understand one day when nothing else matter about us i want to be loved where are you going i can't do this anymore i saw you at the travel agency today johannesburg business samantha samantha white what are you saying are you saying i'll never see you again are you coming or not in or out my friend it's your choice [Music] let's go [Music] so sorry how can this happen she becomes [Music] read one word and i'll kill you i was just kidding you're here yes yes and you're scaring me i i'm gonna approach [Music] don't go anywhere what are you doing don't move your cute british butt there's a gift there's a gift this can't be happening portobello road 10 pounds oh i'm sorry am i too loud actually hoping that you'd sing you it's an amazing gift you're biased [Music] it wasn't a dream i already knew they would happen what do you mean i already saw some of them happened a little differently what happens next on the way to my meeting my watch cracks okay so here's what we're gonna do if your watch cracks then we'll know that something is going on okay almost there we're holding hands i like holding hands do you have the time [Music] i can tell by the unbridled excitement on your faces it's about giving people the most precious gift possible this is a great opportunity and i say grab it what do you think is anything's possible yes so if thing appreciate her and what you have just love her you haven't got much time oliver [Music] i'm sorry sam lottie [Music] can i help you i know you don't know me i'm a friend of lottie's never seen you around me do you know samantha andrews i love miss anne if i was just a few years younger zinc i've never met your family they've been busy i want to see where you became the man i love you guys hey why don't you tell me about him sam let's just forget about everything i just want to be here with you yeah an intense closeness really sharing things with each other nothing could hurt us i love you [Music] your dad was a very handsome guy you know when i was a kid my dad was my hero and he was so proud with his job at the factory wasn't just any job to him everyone loved him though sounds wonderful yes well he was they all lost their jobs he never found another this became his second home i just wish i could have helped him wherever he is i bet he knows how you feel death doesn't put an end to love think so [Music] [Music] [Music] [Music] you see my keys oh it's all right i've got them i've gotta run by the office now okay well just take a sec see you there i need 75 copies and you love me [Music] [Applause] [Music] you're so incredible oh you're biased hey i'm starved where are we gonna eat you looked really cute today new meeting but you didn't come to work today i came to bring you the blue folder but you already had it close your eyes [Music] happy graduation oh my god that's a musical note a violin this one's a flower the train that we took today that's the eiffel tower that you've always wanted to see there's a frying pan that i know that can actually do the flipping thing this one's a heart my heart it's yours now you ready [Applause] i love you i love you too i want to tell you why i love you raining you know that right i have to tell you this and you need to hear it i loved you since i met you i was always thinking ahead making decisions out of fear today what i learned from you every choice i made was different and my life has completely changed samantha is not for today not for you i would never have known love at all so thank you for being the person who taught me to love and to be locked i don't know what to say you don't have to say anything i just wanted to tell you thank you of course [Music] [Applause] we haven't got [Music] i'm so
